DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Vitamin E pentoxifylline may effective decrease lymphedema woman receive radiation therapy breast cancer . PURPOSE : Randomized phase II trial determine effectiveness combine vitamin E pentoxifylline treat woman lymphedema receive radiation therapy breast cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Vitamin E Pentoxifylline Treating Women With Lymphedema After Radiation Therapy Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine effect vitamin E pentoxifylline lymphedema patient previously treat radiotherapy breast cancer . II . Compare normal tissue injury quality life patient treat regimen vs placebo . OUTLINE : This randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . Arm I : Patients receive oral vitamin E oral pentoxifylline twice daily 6 month . Arm II : Patients receive oral placebo twice daily 6 month . Quality life assess baseline 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month . Patients follow 6 12 month . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient ( 50 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Prior diagnosis breast cancer T13 , N01 , M0 Prior radiotherapy breast/chest wall plus axilla and/or supraclavicular fossa At least 2 year since prior radiotherapy No disease recurrence Arm lymphedema due prior radiotherapy Reduced shoulder movement , induration breast/chest wall , radiationinduced brachial plexopathy , symptomatic lung fibrosis , nonhealing wound ( include fracture ) allow evidence disability addition arm lymphedema Hormone receptor status : Not specify PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Age : Not specify Sex : Female male Menopausal status : Not specify Performance status : Not specify Life expectancy : Not specify Hematopoietic : Not specify Hepatic : No liver failure Renal : No renal failure Cardiovascular : No ischemic heart disease No hypertension No hypotension No acute myocardial infarction No prior cerebral hemorrhage No prior retinal hemorrhage Other : Not pregnant Negative pregnancy test Fertile patient must use effective contraception No allergy coconut oil PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Biologic therapy : Not specify Chemotherapy : Not specify Endocrine therapy : No concurrent insulin Radiotherapy : See Disease Characteristics Surgery : No prior axillary surgery Lower axillary sampling allow Other : At least 3 month since prior daily vitamin E supplementation 30 mg/day No prior pentoxifylline radiotherapy No concurrent ketorolac vitamin K No concurrent vitamin E supplementation
